point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Good place
review: This is a good place to visit, went went I visited Nainital, also recommend to other friends... Response has been good... Must visit

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Sri Aurobindo Ashram at nainital
review: Having visited aurobindo ashram at various cities, i was rather curious to cover the one at nainital as well. Its located at a very beautiful hilly terrrain. You can reach this place only using smaller vehicles. We had come to nanital in tempo and hence had to get done little ahead and walk the steep stretch, which was little tiring after the hectic days activities. This is not a ashram per-say rather a boarding school, but has a decided meditation centre in the first floor. Literally no one in the location to guide. Took some time to search the place and enter the meditation hall. Having visited other ashrams, I was rather dis-appointed at this place.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Good place in a scenic location
review: If you want a quiet place with only the sound of nature , rustle of leaves or chirp of birds then this is it...

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Magical Place right in Lap of Nature
review: Though a little difficult to reach, this gem is hidden in the quaint town of Ramgarh. Serene environment with breathtaking views of the mountains. The ashram boasts of a plethora of flora. The highlight was the fruit picking from the numerous Plum, Peach and Pear trees on the property.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Aurobindo Ashram - very nice place to visit - excellent view
review: Aurobindo Ashram, really excellent place to visit, their are so many devotees visit this Ashram and stay here as per their own available time. Good place to worship and medication

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Sri Aurobindo Ashram
review: This is one of my favourite place in Nainital. I had visited this place in 2002 and then in 2017. I have lot of memories with this place and this place is really peaceful.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Ashram for meditation and Yoga
review: It is the himalayan centre for the group dedicated to yoga and meditation.It is also an important center for learning the ancient disciplines.Visitors can visit this place by taking permission from the Ashram's Administrators.This place is Good for health conscious people.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Beautiful
review: This place is really beautiful and well maintained. This place is also good for visiting with family.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Nice ashram
review: This is one of the most beautiful and well maintained place in Nainital. Very peaceful and a must visit place here.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: This is really peaceful and relaxing place
review: This is really peaceful and relaxing place. The kind of environment and ambiance is soothing. This place is must visit.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Very peaceful pleasent place
review: Very good place for children to learn independency and adult are also very happy to learn yoga and physical exercise.children can learn disciplined,time management,mental strength,own routine work,physical exercise, adventure,sharing,helping,respect elders and cultural activities.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Spirituality in peaceful hills
review: This is a branch of aurobindo ashram Pondicherry , if you are a devote you know it all. If not then its a good place to visit for various activities - yoga, meditation or just a quest for spiritual knowledge. They have stay in plans too. If you are a walker it's fine or take a cab to get there .

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Calmness and quietitude
review: If you are only a tourist looking at places to visit, then there are chances that you will be disappointed. But if you are looking for a calm and peaceful place, then this is the ideal place to be, even if it is only for a short visit. The walk to reach the center itself would be a calming nature walk, and there is a beautiful view from the center.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Calmness amidst hills
review: The place is very peaceful and there are numerous activities that you can do there if you are attending a course. From a visitor point of view it is very peaceful abode you can just sit, relax and feel the calmness seeping into you. Its beautifully managed and you can see a good view of nainital from here.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Nice, serene place
review: It is a nice, serene place a little away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Ideal to meditate and stay in harmony with nature.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Peaceful and divine
review: It offers peace and solitude. Numerous activities are available including attending courses related to meditation. The place itself is extremely beautiful

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: A Forest retreat
review: I stayed for two days at the Himalayan  center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram.  This is best suitable for people looking for quietude and silence.  Here you are with nature in absolute term.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Charming
review: I love the shop and all the products in it. The fragrances are truly spectacular and nothing comes close to it. The patchouli and jasmine are the best. It's lovely to see myrrh and frankincense aromas. Takes you a different space.

point_of_interest: Himalayan Center of Sri Aurobindo Ashram
title: Beautiful hill lake
review: Serenity despite milling crowds swirling around the lake shores. Access of motor vehicles has been restricted on the lake shore and this has improved matter greatly
